languages.text: {n}Идира сдержанно кивает.{/n} "Конечно, Лорд-капитан. Я докажу вам, что заслуживаю находиться на этом корабле. Как только почую, что мы где-то рядом, мигом вам весточку пошлю".

traits.locale_text: {n}Идира сдержанно кивает, натянуто улыбаясь.{/n} "Конечно, Лорд-капитан. Я докажу вам, что заслуживаю находиться на этом корабле. Как только почую, что мы где-то рядом, мигом вам весточку пошлю".

languages.text: {n}Idira gives a reserved nod.{/n} "Yes, Lord Captain. I'll prove to you that I deserve a place aboard this ship. As soon as I sense we're close, I'll let you know right away."
languages.original_text: {n}Идира сдержанно кивает.{/n} "Конечно, Лорд-капитан. Я докажу вам, что заслуживаю находиться на этом корабле. Как только почую, что мы где-то рядом, мигом вам весточку пошлю".

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira gives a reserved nod.{/n} "Yes, Lord Captain. I'll prove to you that I deserve a place aboard this ship. Once we're somewhere nearby, I'll sense it and send word right away."
{n}Idira gives a reserved nod.{/n} "Yes, Lord Captain. I'll prove to you that I deserve a place aboard this ship. Once we're somewhere nearby, I'll sense it and send word right away."
{n}Idira gives a reserved nod.{/n} "Yes, Lord Captain. I'll prove to you that I deserve a place aboard this ship. As soon as I sense we're close, I'll let you know right away."
{n}Idira gives a reserved nod.{/n} "Yes, Lord Captain. I'll prove to you that I deserve a place aboard this ship. As soon as I sense we're close, I'll let you know right away."
{n}Idira gives a reserved nod.{/n} "Yes, Lord Captain. I'll prove to you that I deserve a place aboard this ship. As soon as I sense we're close, I'll let you know right away."

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉含蓄地点了点头。{/n}“是啊，舰长大人，我会向你证明我值得留在这艘船上。只要我感觉到我们接近目的地了，我就立刻通知你。”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira gives a reserved nod.{/n} "Yes, Lord Captain. I'll prove to you that I deserve a place aboard this ship. As soon as I sense we're close, I'll let you know right away."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉含蓄地点了点头。{/n}“是啊，舰长大人，我会向你证明我值得留在这艘船上。只要我感觉到我们接近目的地了，我就立刻通知你。”

languages.text: {n}Idira asiente con reservas.{/n} «Sí, Lord Capitán. Le demostraré que merezco un lugar en su nave. En cuanto perciba que estamos cerca, l{mf|e|a} informaré de inmediato».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira gives a reserved nod.{/n} "Yes, Lord Captain. I'll prove to you that I deserve a place aboard this ship. As soon as I sense we're close, I'll let you know right away."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira asiente con reservas.{/n} «Sí, Lord Capitán. Le demostraré que merezco un lugar en su nave. En cuanto perciba que estamos cerca, l{mf|e|a} informaré de inmediato».

languages.text: {n}Idira nickt reserviert.{/n} "Ja, Lord Captain. Ich beweise Euch, dass ich einen Platz an Bord dieses Schiffs verdiene. Sobald ich spüre, dass wir in der Nähe sind, lasse ich es Euch wissen."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira gives a reserved nod.{/n} "Yes, Lord Captain. I'll prove to you that I deserve a place aboard this ship. As soon as I sense we're close, I'll let you know right away."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira nickt reserviert.{/n} "Ja, Lord Captain. Ich beweise Euch, dass ich einen Platz an Bord dieses Schiffs verdiene. Sobald ich spüre, dass wir in der Nähe sind, lasse ich es Euch wissen."

languages.text: {n}イディラは遠慮がちにうなずいた。{/n}「ええ、ロード・キャプテン。あたいがこの船に乗る資格があることを証明してみせるわ。近づいていると感じたら、すぐに知らせるから」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira gives a reserved nod.{/n} "Yes, Lord Captain. I'll prove to you that I deserve a place aboard this ship. As soon as I sense we're close, I'll let you know right away."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは遠慮がちにうなずいた。{/n}「ええ、ロード・キャプテン。あたいがこの船に乗る資格があることを証明してみせるわ。近づいていると感じたら、すぐに知らせるから」

languages.text: {n}Idira hoche prudemment la tête.{/n} « Oui, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je vous prouverai que j'ai ma place à bord de ce vaisseau et je vous ferai immédiatement savoir dès que nous en serons assez proches. »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira gives a reserved nod.{/n} "Yes, Lord Captain. I'll prove to you that I deserve a place aboard this ship. As soon as I sense we're close, I'll let you know right away."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira hoche prudemment la tête.{/n} « Oui, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je vous prouverai que j'ai ma place à bord de ce vaisseau et je vous ferai immédiatement savoir dès que nous en serons assez proches. »

languages.text: {n}İdira, çekinerek başını sallıyor.{/n} "Evet Lord Kaptan. Bu gemide yer almayı hak ettiğimi sana kanıtlayacağım. Yaklaştığımızı hissedince sana hemen haber vereceğim."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira gives a reserved nod.{/n} "Yes, Lord Captain. I'll prove to you that I deserve a place aboard this ship. As soon as I sense we're close, I'll let you know right away."

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira, çekinerek başını sallıyor.{/n} "Evet Lord Kaptan. Bu gemide yer almayı hak ettiğimi sana kanıtlayacağım. Yaklaştığımızı hissedince sana hemen haber vereceğim."
